text: Everything about it. The menu didn t have a good vegetarian vegan option which made it hard for me to have proper meals although the chef did go out of his way to make me something
Good location for our purposes and a good variety of vegetarian dishes for breakfast .
Room was clean Complimentary drinks was a good treat each day. Breakfast could have more vegetarian options Also restaurant menu could have more children s options and vegetarian choices
Breakfast was good Staff are very friendly Location is fantastic. Not many vegetarian options for food
The rooms were good the bathroom was lovely it was peaceful and spacious. No vegan options for food no lock on bathroom doors
Comfy bed very good service a lot of breakfast options including gluten free and vegetarian Nice and helpful staff
Great comfortable rooms Excellent Service Lounge service is good Had nice time. Vegetarian options are limited request you to add more options
The buffet breakfast was quite good and access to public transport was most convenient. More vegetarian options on the menu would be nice
Friendly staff good vibe Spacious rooms The location is great right next to a metro station. Breakfast choices very poor for a vegetarian
Good variety of vegetarian items on the bar menu Spacious bedrooms Rooms were quiet thanks to triple glazing. Would have liked a swimming pool
Very friendly well located and good vegetarian options for breakfast Spacious rooms and very clean well kept and furnished. Wifi should be complimentary across
The location and helpfulness of the staff was great. There was no vegan choices for breakfast and we felt that that was a waste of money Other than that all good

Very good hotel at a very reasonable price I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this hotel Very friendly and helpful staff wonderful sauna and fitness area great location delicious breakfast relatively good selection of vegan options for breakfast
Good breakfast though no vegetarian hot preparations Fruits were freshly cut and nice Restaurant staff not much aware about food ingredients or may be it was language problem

Very good location in the centre of Barcelona with easy access to all areas friendly and very helpful staff comfortable bed and pillows and good facilities. Could have had more vegetarian options and China cups in the bedroom

Good location not far from Wimbledon centre funny organic Vegan cafe. Old building oddly shaped rooms barely usable shower my room was on the top floor under an angled roof the only way to use the shower was to squat in the tub
Free parking and flexible staff who are helpful. Food can be better with some vegetarian choices Smelly dirty carpets in the lobby sorry not on Good walking distance to tube but may be good4health
Great location ideal for Hyde park concerts Lovely room Good car park would recommend to anyone wanting to go to London. Although breakfast was nice it would be nice to have some vegetarian options
staff frendly very clean and comfortable good value for money. the breakfast not a lot of choice im a vegetarian lots of sausages bacon and cold meats although this suited the rest of my party
The location Shower is good. Rooms are small The corridors are so dark and tight The Resturant food only vegetarian stuff The widows are not perfectly seald as u can hear some car noise from out side
